column5: My wife is way up north visiting a sick family member and my 2 year old is stuck hanging out with me lol  Was the trout pond busy?  Was kids catching anything?  thanks all  cheers!

Me and my kids are going trout fishing in the morning. All our gear is packed and ready to go. A nice little speck lake, should be nobody there. Get a nice fire going......roast some weenies and marshmallows.......can't wait!!!  Maybe even get a fish or two!!  Not sure about the trout pond at the show........  Sinker
Had my son there Saturday. He had 2 on but lost them. Waited about 20 minutes in line and got to try for 10 minutes
When we were there it was a zoo and I didn't see anyone catch a fish.  It was worse then the river's opening day!
